name: Unix Domain Socket File
summary: A SOCK file is a Unix domain socket file. It is used to communicate with another program, process, or server. Unix users typically create SOCK files using the socket command.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

linux.display_name: Connect with using nc -U or socat - UNIX-CONNECT: commands

windows.display_name: Connect with using nc -U or socat - UNIX-CONNECT: commands
